'''Dr. Mukerji''' is the doctor from the CDC who responded to the bird flu outbreak.

==History==
When Maya and Jack were treating patients on a stalled subway, Maya noticed that a passenger who had come in from Bashran, where there was an avian flu outbreak, was showing signs he had been infected. She called the CDC and Dr. Mukerji said to keep all the passengers on the car and she was on her way. When she finally arrived, the passengers were evacuated and decontaminated. She also told Jack and Maya that they hadn't been infected and that the strain that Will and Neil had had a vaccine to stop the spread.

==Career==
She's a doctor with the CDC.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Although unconfirmed, Dr. Mukerji can be assumed to be at least an [[Infectious Disease|ID doctor]] given that she was treating patients with bird flu.
